definitions.definition: An act of irradiating , or state of being irradiated .

subdefinitions.definition: a process of sterilization whereby radiation is passed through a bag containing food, utensils, etc., to sterilize the contents.

definitions.definition: The apparent enlargement of a bright object seen upon a dark ground, due to the fact that the portions of the retina around the image are stimulated by the intense light; as when a dark spot on a white ground appears smaller, or a white spot on a dark ground larger, than it really is, especially when a little out of focus .

main_definition: An act of irradiating , or state of being irradiated .
secondary_definitions: ( obsolete , figurative ) mental light or illumination .

( obsolete ) The apparent enlargement of a bright object seen upon a dark ground, due to the fact that the portions of the retina around the image are stimulated by the intense light; as when a dark spot on a white ground appears smaller, or a white spot on a dark ground larger, than it really is, especially when a little out of focus .
